std_narrative.citation:
Jan, son of Barteld Klases & Sytske Jans, died (age 79) on 17 February 1815 in Lippenhuizen, Friesland, Nederland. '''Death Registration''': "BS Overlijden"
AlleFriezen, Collection: Burgerlijke Stand Opsterland - Tresoar, Registration number: 3005, Book: Overlijdensregister 1815 Lippenhuizen
